title: How AI is Revolutionizing Startups in 2025
description: Explore how AI is empowering startups to move faster, smarter, and more efficiently than ever.
author: Jane Doe

content.text: AI & Startups — A Match Made in 2025
In recent years, AI has rapidly transformed industries — but 2025 marks a tipping point...
AI won’t replace you, but a person using AI will.
content.author: Garry Kasparov

content.text: From automating tasks to generating creative content, AI tools are now core to most early-stage startups.
